channel.title: Crash when i turn on the big fan
channel.description: so im in the big fan chamber to turn on the fuel/oxygen for the rocket silo,,,and when i turn on the fan it takes a couple of seconds and i crash. ataching the MDMP hope you can help, thanks in advance ps: great game hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T10_12_22C0.mdmp (87.6 KB)

item.title: Crash when i turn on the big fan
item.dc:creator: adl_all_day
item.description:
This was happening to me as well. I found that if I cleared the fan from all debris before turning it on and then ran back up the ladder as fast as I could it would not crash.
Although… Now I’m stuck and have no idea where to go or what to do.
